name: 孩之岛
summary: A boys view of lust and life, 15 August 1998 Author: Joergen Pagh Jensen (juvelen@get2net.dk) from Frederiksvaerk, Denmark 10 year old Renee lives in a Stockholm suburb alone with his mother. She has only limited time and heart for her boy. Her lover Stig is a scary and frustrated loser. When Renee's mother leaves home for a summer job in another town, Renee is "deported" to a ...
